content: sunflower pet snuggle blanket inspired by the rainbow ripple baby blanket by celeste young worsted weight yarn for sunflower look use orange or brown for the center and yellow for the petals feel free to vary the colors changing colors at the end of any round size i/9 5 5 mm crochet hook stitch abbreviations american terminology chain chain st stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet
